bonus.value: Increase Serpent Chain member limit to 5. When at least 1 physical weapon is equipped, increase physical ATK by 14%/16%/18%/20%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
After applying the snake bite effect, increase physical ATK by 9% for 30 seconds. Works in the off-hand slot. While in the combat state, increase final damage by 14%/17%/20%/23%.

mind.name: Infused in Tea
mind.desc: Deep thoughts buried within a strong fragrance.

memory.name: Blank Slate
memory.desc: In the midst of the fog, there is something that must be held onto dearly, lest it be gone once more.

belief.name: Rebuilding
belief.desc: Picking the pieces back up is the first step toward putting things back together.

emotion.name: Passionate
emotion.desc: Burning thoughts masked in blank expression.
